text: Veca tu bihna fireh niþan de cewa ku pexemberen xwediye hewiye bihna fireh niþan dan, u tu ji wan re nelezine. Ew, roja ku tiþte tene wade dayin dibinin, ew herweki ku ji daneki roje peve (li dine) nemabin. (Ev Qur´ana han) ragihandin e-qim dike. Veca ma qey ji komela ji rastiye derketi peve tek te birin
